byline.original: By LISA W. FODERARO and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: A late-morning call to the National Park Service warned of a package in a locker, and SWAT teams and bomb-sniffing dogs replaced tourists and other visitors at the site.

headline.main: Bomb Threat Causes Evacuation of Statue of Liberty and Liberty Island
headline.print_headline: Bomb Threat Causes Evacuation of Statue of Liberty and Liberty Island

snippet: A late-morning call to the National Park Service warned of a package in a locker, and SWAT teams and bomb-sniffing dogs replaced tourists and other visitors at the site.
